body.motivation: decimator helps producers, educators, video makers, and many others to do what they love. it's a different kind of service that is made with love, not for profit.
body.no_bullshit: we believe that the internet doesn't have to be scary, which is why decimator will never have ads or other kinds of malicious content. it's a promise that we firmly stand by. everything we do is built with privacy, accessibility, and ease of use in mind, making decimator available for everyone.
body.keep_going: if you found decimator useful, please consider supporting our work! you can help us by making a donation or sharing decimator with a friend. every donation is highly appreciated and helps us keep working on decimator and other projects.
